Name: Committee Publicity
Desc: To boost consumption, the business owner committee has launched a promotional event for Fancy Food. Fancy Food can expect an increase in revenue.

Name: Infrastructure Maintenance
Desc: The Commercial District has increased its input in infrastructure maintenance from today and the Commercial Square's Atmosphere points will increase as a result.

Name: Commercial Square Benefit Day
Desc: The BCC has strengthened promotional advertising for Benefit Day deals in the media. More customers will visit today.

Name: Influencer Visit Event
Desc: The committee has hired multiple influencers to visit and promote Dolly's Bakery, which is highly effective. Dolly's Bakery can expect more revenue.

Name: Youth Center Art Exhibition Event
Desc: Inn Elite has invited children from the Youth Center to hold an in-store art exhibition, which has created a unique photo spot and attracted more customers to the department store.

Name: Idol Charity Performance
Desc: At the Commissioner's invitation, Karenina held a charity performance at the Commercial Square and significantly boosted recent customer foot traffic.

Name: Documentary: "The Commissioner"
Desc: The WGAA's recent documentary on the Commissioner's routine work went viral online, which has greatly increased the Commercial Square's media exposure.

Name: Logistics Standardization
Desc: The Commissioner recently optimized the material import channels for the development plan. All stores will see increased profits.

Name: Festival-Themed Gallery
Desc: The construction of the "Four Seasons Lantern Gallery" has officially been completed under the committee's leadership The Commercial Square's traffic has surged dramatically.

Name: Art Collab
Desc: The WGAA started a joint promotional campaign with Inn Elite, launching Commercial Square-themed merchandise that has boosted Inn Elite's revenue.

Name: Commercial Square Shopping Voucher Distribution
Desc: The BCC has recently launched a concentrated distribution of Commercial Square shopping coupons, which has significantly increased the square's foot traffic.

Name: Greening Project
Desc: The BCC has recently invested in and improved the overall green landscaping and ecology of the Commercial District.

Name: In-Store Environment Rating
Desc: The committee announced it will conduct a comprehensive survey and rating of the indoor environments of Commercial Square stores, which has encouraged shop owners to actively improve their store environments.

Name: CUB Influencer
Desc: A recent video of a cat CUB standing guard at the Commercial Square went viral online, which has boosted the square's fame.

Name: Light Pollution Restriction
Desc: The Commissioner has imposed restrictions on neon light brightness for all stores, which has enhanced the aesthetic appeal of the Commercial Square's environment.

Name: Product Delivery Overload
Desc: The Commercial Square's rapidly increasing product delivery demands have negatively impacted the Commercial District's traffic flow.

Name: Gravity Regulator Malfunction
Desc: Hull maintenance caused the square's gravity regulator to malfunction intermittently, which has affected the normal operations of square stores.

Name: Waste Recycling Overload
Desc: As the Commercial Square becomes increasingly prosperous, the daily output of household waste in the area is also increasing, putting enormous pressure on the Commercial District's public recycle system.

Name: Weight Loss Craze
Desc: Recent videos about healthy eating have gone viral online, causing body image anxiety among some people and negatively impacting revenue for related stores.

Name: Ship Hull Emergency Maintenance
Desc: Potential breach danger was detected in the hull's inner wall somewhere in the square. The Engineering Force rushed to the scene for emergency repairs. The prolonged work has affected the normal operations of square stores.

Name: False Advertising
Desc: Recently, Inn Elite was called out by anti-fraud influencers for selling products that don't match their advertising, which has affected its public image.

Name: Marquee Malfunction
Desc: Recently, the marquee experienced content abnormality. The causes are still under investigation. This has led to negative public opinion on outer ring stores.

Name: Cutthroat Competition
Desc: Two stores that haven't joined the committee recently engaged in low-price competition. Though promptly stopped by the Commissioner, it has still caused negative impacts on store operations in the Commercial Square.

Name: Import Delay
Desc: Affected by weather conditions on the surface, raw material orders imported from the conservation area were forced to be delayed.

Name: Baseless Rumor
Desc: Recently, rumors have been spreading on social media that square stores generally have food safety issues. Although officials promptly came forward to clarify, it has still caused impacts on the Commercial Square's image.
